actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

official_title: A bill to amend a law relating to the sale of obsolete vessels for use in the fisheries of the United States.

summary.text: Amends a specified Federal law to allow conversion work on certain obsolete vessels sold for use in U.S. fisheries to be performed outside the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend a law relating to the sale of obsolete vessels for use in the fisheries of the United States.
